dmca.title: Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jill Badlotto [mailto:jill@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Monday, August 14, 2006 3:41 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP
Subject: Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP


The below is a Cease and Desist letter referencing your client Powersellernyc.com
and our client Sony with specific respects to Camcorder. Your client continues the
use the copyrighted images/text and/or trademarked logos of Sony Camcorder. The
notice was originally sent to your client on 08/01/06. As of this time the website
was rechecked and the infringing material has not been removed in its entirety. We
are informing you in an attempt to get this resolved. Please assist us in having
this material removed from your clients' website.

________________________________

Phoenix Office:


Ellis & Venable


101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875


Phoenix, Arizona 85003

voice: (602) 631-9393

fax: (602) 631-9796

 

8/1/2006

 

 


7006 0810 0000 2690 3929


 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes

1333 Stemmons Pwy.Ste. 110

Dallas,TX75207

 

Re:       Unauthorized Use of Sony'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

 

Dear Designated Agent:

 

We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you with
respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials.  

 

Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its
rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials.
 Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17
U.S.C.
